text: Ezɨ Jehu dɨkavigha dɨpenimɨn aven ghuzɨ, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim an gɨn ghua olivɨn borem inigha Jehun dapanim ginga kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir God, a Israelian God, kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn Israelian atrivimɨn ikiasa nɨ amɨsefe. Eghtɨ nɨ nan gumazamiziba Israelia, me gativagh men ganam.
